entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
